summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered on April 11, 2003. It includes information about discounts applied, total charges, and shipment details involving various individuals and entities.

persons.name: Lauren Kuntner
persons.context: Lauren Kuntner is listed as the sender for one of the FedEx shipments detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Gabriel Perahia
persons.context: Gabriel Perahia is mentioned as the recipient for a shipment sent via FedEx.

persons.name: Darren K. Novice
persons.context: Darren K. Novice is listed as the sender for another FedEx shipment detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Christian
persons.context: Christian is mentioned as the recipient for a shipment sent via FedEx.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated April 11, 2003, and details transportation charges totaling $39.71.
Lauren Kuntner and Darren K. Novice are identified as senders for different shipments.
Gabriel Perahia and Christian are identified as recipients for the respective shipments.
The invoice includes discounts applied to the total charges.
Multiple tracking IDs are provided for the shipments detailed in the invoice.
